deep fusion strategy.from sentence: In this paper , we adopt a deep fusion strategy to model the strong interactions of two sentences .

text matching.from sentence: Thus , text matching can be regarded as modelling the interaction of two texts in a recursive matching way .

two interconnected conditional LSTMs.from sentence: More concretely , DF - LSTMs consist of two interconnected conditional LSTMs , each of which models apiece of text under the influence of another .

output vector.from sentence: The output vector of DF - LSTMs is fed into a task - specific output layer to compute the match - ing score .

deep fusion long short - term memory neu.from sentence: Following this idea , we propose deep fusion long short - term memory neural networks ( DF - LSTMs ) to model the interactions recursively .
